description.ko: 중력과 빛이 거대한 우주적 공포의 구조물을 만들어내는 우주의 중심부로의 여정입니다.
description.en: A journey to the heart of the universe, where gravity and light create a majestic structure of cosmic horror.

prompt: An impossible celestial cathedral formed by the gravitational lensing of a supermassive black hole. Pillars of compressed #3D1A78 starlight and swirling #0D0221 dark matter filaments define the structure. Surrounded by a massive event horizon and gas clouds of #7B68EE and #E6E6FA. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Dramatic lighting from the accretion disk core, creating a sense of infinite scale and the silent majesty of the cosmic abyss.
